q: `` In my clear opinion, Larry Page is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come,'' Eric Schmidt said. Larry Page praised Eric Schmidt , too. There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly, Larry Page said.`` Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him.'' Gabrielle Giffords , Colin Powell said he was dismayed by the harsh tenor of political debate that some have said may have contributed to the attack. There has crept in our society and our public dialogue, a coarseness, a nastiness, an attack of people who don't share the same views as you do, he said.`` All sorts of nastiness.
